iuhoosiers.com/2015/04/field-hockey-sign.snippet: BLOOMINGTON, Ind. - Indiana field hockey has announced two additional signees for the 2015 class, goalkeeper Noëlle Rother and midfielder/defender Nora Aucker. The two players will join fall signees Claire Woods and Taylor Swope on the 2015 roster.
